edu.ohio.ent.cs5500

Class Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ohio.ent.cs5500.Node

  • public class Node
extends java.lang.Object
    CS 4500/5500 Advanced OO Design and GUI Techniques.
    This class is written as part of the course cs4500/5500 under guidance and instruction of Dr. Dusan Sormaz.
    This class contains all the information of the node object, i.e. the relation with other nodes.
    Author:
    Arif
